blessings.description: Your Team will pay out double to all Fans when they trigger the Black Hole.
blessings.subheader: Brought to you by @the Multitude Podcast Collective@https://multitude.productions/shows
blessings.title: Jam-Packed

blessings.description: Your Team will pay out double to all Fans when they trigger Sun 2.
blessings.title: Glazed

blessings.description: Your Team will pay out double for Popcorn.
blessings.title: Buttered Up

blessings.description: Your Team will pay out double for Stale Popcorn.
blessings.title: Over Salted

blessings.description: The worst Player on your Team will draw a walk on 3 Balls instead of 4.
blessings.title: Solo Stroll

blessings.description: Every Team in your division gets one Minimalist and one Maximalist.
blessings.title: Min-Maxing

blessings.description: A random pitcher and a random hitter on your Team will Advance.
blessings.title: Targeted Evolution

blessings.description: Your Team is no longer allergic to Peanuts.
blessings.title: The Nut Button

blessings.description: Maybe try throwing with the other one? Your Team's pitching changes anywhere from -5% to +15%
blessings.title: Non-Dominant Arms

blessings.description: Vision of things to come. Improve 3 random hitters on your Team by 20%.
blessings.title: Precognition

blessings.description: Arrange your lineup in order of their Idolatry.
blessings.title: Headliners

blessings.description: They won't stop screaming. Randomizes your Team's 5 worst players.
blessings.title: Soul Swap

decrees.description: All Fans will gain 2 new temporary Snack Slots each Earlsiesta and 2 new temporary Snack slots each Latesiesta. The 4 extra Slots and the Snacks in them will be washed away after each Election.
decrees.title: Meal Plan

decrees.description: All Fans gain 3 Snack Slots permanently. Every Season, 3 Snacks in Concessions will be randomly selected to be Spoiled, earning extremely low payouts, with a small chance of a Gourmet Jackpot.
decrees.title: Pot Luck

decrees.description: Fans will be able to freely buy and sell Snack Slots at any time. The less Snack Slots a Fan owns, the higher the payout for the Snacks in them.
decrees.title: All You Can Eat

wills.description: Steal a Player from the Idols board. Send a random Player from your Team back.

info.description: Which Idol do you want to steal?

wills.title: Plunder

wills.description: Swap a Player from a Team in the opposite Subleague with a Player from your Team.

info.description: Which team do you want to swap with?
What player do you want to swap for?
What player do you want to send back?

wills.title: Exchange

wills.description: Swap a Player from your Shadows to your active roster.

info.description: What player from the Shadows do you want to call up to the active roster?
What player from your active roster do you want to send to the Shadows?

wills.title: Foreshadow

wills.description: Boost a Player on your Team by 15% to 30%.

info.description: Which player do you want to Boost?

wills.title: Infuse

wills.description: Receive a mystery Benefit for one of your Teams' Players.

info.description: Which player do you want to receive the Benefit?

wills.title: Trust

wills.description: Call in an Alternate for a Player on your Team.

info.description: Which player do you want to call an Alternate for?

wills.title: Alternate

wills.description: Revoke a Player from your roster.

info.description: Which player do you want to revoke?

wills.title: Revoke

wills.description: Pick a modification for your Team next season.
wills.title: Enrich
